thread.title: President El-Sisi endorses decree on 50 percent rise in Egypt's share in IMF-SIS

title: President El-Sisi endorses decree on 50 percent rise in Egypt's share in IMF-SIS
text:
President El-Sisi endorses decree on 50 percent rise in Egypt's share in IMF
Thursday، 09 January 2025 - 01:09 PM
President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi endorsed decree no 249 of 2024 approving a 50 percent rise in Egypt's share in the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
The parliament gave the nod to the final draft of the decree on Oct 7, 2024.
The decree was published in the official gazette on Thursday.
MENA
